statements.statement: SELECT ROWIDTOCHAR( A.ROWID ) DATA_ROW_ID ,A.DFRD_BIZ_ID ,A.INST_NO ,A.NODE_NO ,A.DFRD_SEQ ,B.PROC_ST ,B.PROC_STRT_DT ,B.PROC_END_DT ,A.GUID ,A.PATH_NO ,A.TRAN_ID ,A.TRAN_DT ,A.TRAN_HEADER ,A.IN_DATA1 ,A.IN_DATA2 FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATA_TB01 A ,DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATPROC_TB B WHERE A.DFRD_SEQ BETWEEN ${STRT_DFRD_SEQ} AND ${END_DFRD_SEQ} AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND A.NODE_NO = ${NODE_NO} AND A.INST_NO = ${INST_NO} AND B.DFRD_PROC_ID = ${DFRD_PROC_ID} AND A.TRAN_DT = B.TRAN_DT AND B.DAY_CD = SUBSTR(A.TRAN_DT,7,2) AND A.INST_NO = B.INST_NO AND A.NODE_NO = B.NODE_NO AND A.DFRD_SEQ = B.DFRD_SEQ

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A) USE_HASH(A B) */ count(1) AS DFRD_CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB A ,DEVON.SERL_APPLOG_LG01 B WHERE A.DFRD_PROC_ID IN ( ${DFRD_PROC_ID:string:in} ) AND A.SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD} AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID = B.DFRD_BIZ_ID AND B.TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND B.DFRD_SEQ = 0

SELECT NVL(SUM(END_DFRD_SEQ - STRT_DFRD_SEQ + 1 - NOR_END_CNT - ERR_END_CNT - CFM_END_CNT),0) AS NOT_CNT FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND DFRD_PROC_ID IN ( ${DFRD_PROC_ID:string:in} ) AND PROC_ST IN ('00','01') AND DAY_CD = SUBSTR(${TRAN_DT},7,8)

SELECT SUBSTR(A.DFRD_BIZ_ID, 2, 3) AS 후행업무코드_V3 , B.DFRD_BIZ_ID AS 후행업무ID_V20, B.DFRD_PROC_ID AS 후행처리ID_V50 FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDBIZ_TB A, DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB B WHERE A.SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD} AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID LIKE 'D'||${DFRD_BWK_CD}|| '%' {#1} AND B.SITE_CD = A.SITE_CD AND B.DFRD_BIZ_ID = A.DFRD_BIZ_ID AND B.DFRD_PROC_ID LIKE 'D'||${DFRD_BWK_CD}|| '%' ORDER BY 후행업무코드_V3 , 후행업무ID_V20, 후행처리ID_V50 ASC
AND A.DFRD_BIZ_ID IN ( ${DFRD_BIZ_ID:string:in} )

SELECT SUBSTR(DFRD_PROC_ID, 2, 3) AS 후행업무코드_V3 , DFRD_PROC_ID AS 후행처리ID_V50 FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDPROC_TB WHERE SITE_CD = ${SITE_CD} AND DFRD_PROC_ID LIKE 'D'||${DFRD_BWK_CD}|| '%' ORDER BY 후행업무코드_V3, 후행처리ID_V50 ASC

SELECT TRAN_DT AS 후행처리일자_V8, DFRD_PROC_ID AS 후행처리ID_V50, PROC_ST AS 후행처리상태코드_V2, SUM(CASE WHEN PROC_ST IN ('21','31','91','41' ) THEN ERR_END_CNT + CFM_END_CNT /* 21 시스템 오류, 31 비즈오류, 41 롤백종료, 91 비정상종료 */ WHEN PROC_ST = '10' THEN END_DFRD_SEQ - STRT_DFRD_SEQ + 1 /* 처리 진행중 */ ELSE END_DFRD_SEQ - STRT_DFRD_SEQ + 1 - NOR_END_CNT - ERR_END_CNT - CFM_END_CNT END) AS 후행건수_N8 FROM DEVON.SERE_DFRDDATBLCK_TB WHERE 1=1 AND TRAN_DT = ${DFRD_TRAN_DT} AND DFRD_PROC_ID IN ( ${DFRD_PROC_ID:STRING:IN} ) AND PROC_ST <> '11' /* 11 정상처리 */ {#1} GROUP BY TRAN_DT, DFRD_PROC_ID, PROC_ST ORDER BY 후행처리일자_V8, 후행처리ID_V50, 후행처리상태코드_V2
AND PROC_ST = ${DFRD_PRC_ST}
